statements: SELECT * FROM student_info;
SELECT student_id, name FROM student_info;
SELECT name, grade FROM student_info WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM student_info WHERE grade >= 70;
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM student_info;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) FROM student_info GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_info ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade) FROM student_info;
SELECT MAX(grade) FROM student_info;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM student_info ORDER BY grade DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_id, SUM(grade) FROM student_info GROUP BY student_id HAVING SUM(grade) > 200;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade IN (80, 85, 90);
SELECT student_id, name, attendance_record FROM student_info WHERE LENGTH(attendance_record) > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_info;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade >= (SELECT AVG(grade) FROM student_info);
SELECT student_id, name FROM student_info WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade > 75 ORDER BY grade LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT name, grade FROM student_info WHERE grade BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT student_id, name FROM student_info WHERE attendance_record LIKE '%Present%';
SELECT student_id, name FROM student_info WHERE attendance_record NOT LIKE '%Absent%';
SELECT MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM student_info;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_info;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_info;
SELECT * FROM student_info ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_info ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_info GROUP BY name;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND grade > 85;
SELECT name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM student_info GROUP BY name HAVING AVG(grade) > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM student_info;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade = (SELECT MAX(grade) FROM student_info);
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade = (SELECT MIN(grade) FROM student_info);
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE grade IN (SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM student_info WHERE grade < 80);
SELECT name, LENGTH(name) AS name_length FROM student_info;
SELECT name, CONCAT('Grade: ', grade) AS student_grade FROM student_info;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule FROM Courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT student_id, name, grade, attendance FROM Students WHERE grade = 'B' AND attendance < 80;
SELECT student_id, name, grade, attendance FROM Students WHERE grade = 'C' OR attendance >= 70;
SELECT name, grade, attendance FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses ORDER BY schedule ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 3;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS num_students FROM Enrollments GROUP BY course_id HAVING num_students < 5;
SELECT student_id, name, grade, attendance FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A' UNION SELECT student_id, name, grade, attendance FROM Students WHERE attendance >= 90;
SELECT AVG(attendance) AS average_attendance FROM Students;
SELECT SUM(attendance) AS total_attendance FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT MAX(attendance) AS highest_attendance FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_students FROM Enrollments INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING num_students > 10;
SELECT student_id, name, grade, attendance FROM Students WHERE name LIKE '%Tom%' AND grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT name, attendance FROM Students WHERE grade = 'B';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students;
SELECT AVG(attendance) FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, schedule FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE attendance >= 90;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance < 70;
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%Mon%';
SELECT AVG(attendance) AS avg_attendance FROM Students;
SELECT instructor, COUNT(*) AS num_courses FROM Courses GROUP BY instructor;
SELECT student_id, name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT name AS student_name, course_name AS enrolled_course FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, name, course_name FROM Students LEFT JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, name, course_name FROM Students RIGHT JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT SUM(attendance) FROM Students;
SELECT name FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_grade FROM students
SELECT DISTINCT student_grade FROM students
SELECT * FROM grades
SELECT grade_title, grade_value FROM grades
SELECT * FROM attendance
SELECT date, present FROM attendance
SELECT student_name, grade_title FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, present FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_name, date, present FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_id, date, present FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, student_grade, present FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_name, grade_title FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, grade_title FROM students LEFT JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, grade_title FROM students RIGHT JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade < 50
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE date = '2023-07-15'
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_grade > 75;
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade_value FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT grade_title, COUNT(grade_id) AS total_grades FROM grades GROUP BY grade_title;
SELECT student_name, MAX(grade_value) AS max_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT student_name, MIN(grade_value) AS min_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT student_id, SUM(grade_value) AS total_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING SUM(grade_value) > 100;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE present = true GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_grade > 80 GROUP BY students.student_id;

SELECT student_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY student_id;

SELECT student_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_records CONTAINS 'Absent' GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_name = 'Alice' GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_title FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT student_name, MAX(grade_value) AS max_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_grade = 12 GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT student_name, MIN(grade_value) AS min_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Grades;
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_id, date FROM Attendance;
SELECT Students.student_name, Grades.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses ORDER BY credits ASC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS num_courses FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Courses INNER JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, MIN(attendance.date) AS first_attendance_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS num_attendance FROM Students LEFT JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) <= 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE grade > 70;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE attendance = FALSE;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade <= 50;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade < 60;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance = FALSE;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 100;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade > 95;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits < 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE grade < 70;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade = 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, professor FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Enrollments;
SELECT * FROM Grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades;
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, status FROM Attendance;
SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id;
SELECT Students.name, Grades.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT Students.name, Courses.professor FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id;
SELECT Students.name, Attendance.status FROM Students INNER JOIN Attendance ON Students.id = Attendance.student_id;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Courses INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT Students.name, Grades.grade, Courses.course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.id;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date, Grades.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Grades.course_id;
SELECT Students.name, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id GROUP BY Students.name;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades;
SELECT Students.name, SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.name;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id WHERE Students.grade > 90;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Courses.credits > 3;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Courses.course_name ILIKE 'Math%';

SELECT Students.name, COUNT(Enrollments.course_id) AS course_count FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id GROUP BY Students.name HAVING COUNT(Enrollments.course_id) >= 2;
SELECT Courses.course_name, AVG(Grades.grade) AS average_grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY Courses.course_name ORDER BY average_grade DESC;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Students.attendance = TRUE;

SELECT Students.name, SUM(Courses.credits) AS total_credits FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id GROUP BY Students.name HAVING total_credits > 10;

SELECT Students.name, CASE WHEN Enrollments.enrollment_date IS NULL THEN 'Not Enrolled' ELSE 'Enrolled' END AS enrollment_status FROM Students LEFT JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Enrollments.enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Students.name, AVG(Grades.grade) AS average_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.name HAVING AVG(Grades.grade) < 60;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Students.grade < Grades.grade AND Students.name ILIKE 'A%';

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, COUNT(Attendance.status) AS attendance_count FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.id = Attendance.student_id JOIN Courses ON Attendance.course_id = Courses.id GROUP BY Students.name;

SELECT Courses.course_name, Professor, COUNT(Enrollments.student_id) AS student_count FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY Courses.course_name, Professor HAVING COUNT(Enrollments.student_id) > 5;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Courses.course_name = 'English' OR Courses.course_name = 'Math';
SELECT Students.name, CASE WHEN Grades.grade >= 70 THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END AS result FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Courses.credits BETWEEN 3 AND 5;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Enrollments.enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT Students.name, MAX(Grades.grade) AS highest_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.name HAVING MAX(Grades.grade) > 90;
SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.id WHERE Courses.credits < 4;
SELECT Students.name, SUM(Grades.grade) AS total_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.name HAVING SUM(Grades.grade) > 200;
